knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r load_libraries}

library(dplyr)
library(rvest)

```

```{r}

link = "https://www.goodreads.com/review/list/167950961?ref=nav_mybooks"

page = read_html(link)
```

```{r}
title = page %>% html_nodes(".title .value") %>% html_text()

title
```


```{r}
author = page %>% html_nodes("#booksBody .author a") %>% html_text()

author
```

```{r}
date = page %>%  html_nodes(".date_pub .value") %>% html_text()

date
```

```{r}

goodreads <- data.frame(title, author, date, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

```
